articles.title: Anthropic Releases Critical Security Patch for Claude 3.5 Sonnet
articles.author: Alexa Martinez
articles.summary: Anthropic issues a critical security update for Claude 3.5 Sonnet addressing a vulnerability that could potentially allow prompt injection attacks.

articles.title: Claude 3.5 Sonnet Gets Major Update with Enhanced Reasoning Capabilities
articles.author: Jordan Chen
articles.summary: Anthropic rolls out a significant update to Claude 3.5 Sonnet, featuring improved reasoning abilities and specialized knowledge in several technical domains.

articles.title: Anthropic Strengthens Claude 3.5 Sonnet's Data Privacy Controls
articles.author: Priya Sharma
articles.summary: New security features for Claude 3.5 Sonnet provide enterprise customers with enhanced data control options and improved privacy guarantees.
